events.message: I ordered a laptop two weeks ago and the shipping is still not complete. The tracking number shows no updates and my delivery is late.
System has classified the reported issue as a Delivery Delay based on keywords present in the customer's initial message.
An agent specializing in shipping and delivery issues has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your delayed shipment. I’m here to help you track and resolve this issue.
Could you please confirm the order number and any tracking details you have? This will help me investigate the delay further.
The order number is #89765432 and the tracking code is ABC123XYZ. Unfortunately, the tracking site hasn’t updated for days.
We have contacted the courier service to escalate your shipment. Meanwhile, we can offer a discount on your next purchase as an apology for this delay.
Thank you for the update and the discount offer. I appreciate your prompt help and hope the delivery will arrive soon.
The courier confirmed the package is out for delivery today. Please expect your laptop by the end of the day.
Just checking in to ensure your laptop was delivered successfully and everything is working as expected.
Yes, I received it yesterday and everything is perfect. Thanks for your support throughout this process!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now, and please reach out if you need any further assistance.
